mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIKES(ID, PROJECT_ID, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (LIKE_SEQ.nextVal, #{dto.projectId}, #{dto.memberId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LIKES WHERE PROJECT_ID=#{dto.projectId} AND MEMBER_ID=#{dto.memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKES INNER JOIN PROJECT ON LIKES.PROJECT_ID = PROJECT.ID WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
